<body>
  <script language="JavaScript">
		<!--
		
		//
		// Script by Jari Aarniala [www.mbnet.fi/~foo -- foo@mbnet.fi]
		//
		// This script makes it easy to choose with which search engine
		// you`d like to search the net. You may use this if you keep this
		// text here...
		//
		
		function startSearch(){
			searchString = document.searchForm.searchText.value; 
			if(searchString != ""){
			searchEngine = document.searchForm.whichEngine.selectedIndex + 1;
			finalSearchString = "";
			}
			if(searchEngine == 1){
			finalSearchString = "https://www.google.com/search?q=" + searchString;
			window.open(finalSearchString);
			}
			if(searchEngine == 2){
			finalSearchString1 = "http://www.wordreference.com/pten/" + searchString;
			finalSearchString2 = "http://dictionary.reverso.net/portuguese-english/" + searchString;
			finalSearchString3 = "http://www.linguee.com/english-portuguese/search?source=portuguese&query=" + searchString;
			finalSearchString4 = "http://en.bab.la/dictionary/portuguese-english/" + searchString;
			finalSearchString5 = "http://michaelis.uol.com.br/moderno/ingles/index.php?lingua=portugues-ingles&palavra=" + searchString;
			finalSearchString6 = "http://www.proz.com/?sp=asearch&term=" + searchString + "&from=por&to=eng&DICengines=KudoZ|Ectaco|IATE|Logos&MTengines=GoogleTrans|Intertran&SEARCHengines=Google|Clusty|MSN|WebCorp|Alltheweb|Altavista|Lycos|Yahoo|Teoma|Metacrawler&bidir=0&SE_lang=0&entity_id=11&UsingIE=1";
			finalSearchString7 = "http://translate.google.com/#pt/en/" + searchString;
			finalSearchString8 = "http://translation.babylon.com/portuguese/to-english/" + searchString;
			finalSearchString9 = "http://pt-en.dict.cc/?s=" + searchString;
			finalSearchString10 = "http://en.pons.eu/dict/search/results/?q=" + searchString + "&l=enpt&in=&lf=pt";
			window.open(finalSearchString1, '_blank');
			window.open(finalSearchString2, '_blank');
			window.open(finalSearchString3, '_blank');
			window.open(finalSearchString4, '_blank');
			window.open(finalSearchString5, '_blank');
			window.open(finalSearchString6, '_blank');
			window.open(finalSearchString7, '_blank');
			window.open(finalSearchString8, '_blank');
			window.open(finalSearchString9, '_blank');
			window.open(finalSearchString10, '_blank');
			}
			if(searchEngine == 3){
			finalSearchString1 = "http://www.wordreference.com/pten/" + searchString;
			finalSearchString2 = "http://dictionary.reverso.net/portuguese-english/" + searchString;
			finalSearchString3 = "http://www.linguee.com/english-portuguese/search?source=portuguese&query=" + searchString;
			window.open(finalSearchString1, '_blank');
			window.open(finalSearchString2, '_blank');
			window.open(finalSearchString3, '_blank');
			}
			if(searchEngine == 4){
			finalSearchString = "http://www.wordreference.com/pten/" + searchString;
			window.open(finalSearchString);
			}
			if(searchEngine == 5){
			finalSearchString = "http://dictionary.reverso.net/portuguese-english/" + searchString;
			window.open(finalSearchString);
			}
			if(searchEngine == 6){
			finalSearchString = "http://www.linguee.com/english-portuguese/search?source=portuguese&query=" + searchString;
			window.open(finalSearchString);
			}
			if(searchEngine == 7){
			finalSearchString = "http://en.bab.la/dictionary/portuguese-english/" + searchString;
			window.open(finalSearchString);
			}
			if(searchEngine == 8){
			finalSearchString = "http://michaelis.uol.com.br/moderno/ingles/index.php?lingua=portugues-ingles&palavra=" + searchString;
			window.open(finalSearchString);
			}
			if(searchEngine == 9){
			finalSearchString = "http://www.proz.com/?sp=asearch&term=" + searchString + "&from=por&to=eng&DICengines=KudoZ|Ectaco|IATE|Logos&MTengines=GoogleTrans|Intertran&SEARCHengines=Google|Clusty|MSN|WebCorp|Alltheweb|Altavista|Lycos|Yahoo|Teoma|Metacrawler&bidir=0&SE_lang=0&entity_id=11&UsingIE=1";
			window.open(finalSearchString);
			}
			if(searchEngine == 10){
			finalSearchString = "http://translate.google.com/#pt/en/" + searchString;
			window.open(finalSearchString);
			}
			if(searchEngine == 11){
			finalSearchString = "http://translation.babylon.com/portuguese/to-english/" + searchString;
			window.open(finalSearchString);
			}
			if(searchEngine == 12){
			finalSearchString = "http://pt-en.dict.cc/?s=" + searchString;
			window.open(finalSearchString);
			}
			if(searchEngine == 13){
			finalSearchString = "http://en.pons.eu/dict/search/results/?q=" + searchString + "&l=enpt&in=&lf=pt";
			window.open(finalSearchString);
			}
		}
		// -->
</script>
<form name="searchForm" onsubmit="startSearch()">
<table align="center" border=0 cellpadding=0>
	<tr>
        <td>
            <select class="default" name="whichEngine" tabindex="1">
                <option>Google</option>
                <option>Pt&rarr;En (all)</option>
                <option>En&rarr;Pt (all)</option>
                <option>Pt&rarr;En WordReference</option>
                <option>Pt&rarr;En Reverso</option>
                <option>Pt&rarr;En Linguee</option>
                <option>Pt&rarr;En bab.la</option>
                <option>Pt&rarr;En Michaelis</option>
                <option>Pt&rarr;En ProZ</option>
                <option>Pt&rarr;En Google Translate</option>
                <option>Pt&rarr;En Babylon</option>
                <option>Pt&rarr;En dict.cc</option>
                <option>Pt&rarr;En PONS.eu</option>
            </select>
        </td>
        <td>
        	<input name="searchText" type="text" size="75" tabindex="2">
        </td>
		<td>
        	<input type="button" value="Search" tabindex="3">
        </td>
    </tr>
</table>
</form>
<script type="text/javascript">
		var MenuBar1 = new Spry.Widget.MenuBar("MenuBar1", {imgDown:"SpryAssets/SpryMenuBarDownHover.gif", imgRight:"SpryAssets/SpryMenuBarRightHover.gif"});
    </script>

    <br>

    <br> 
        <a href="http://www.proz.com/forum/omegat_support/146666-importing_a_translation_memory_into_omegat.html">Importing a translation memory into OmegaT (OmegaT support)</a>
